quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: Love is a many-splendored thing.
author: Paul Simon

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every day.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
author: Loretta Young

quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Stephen Chbosky

quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Love doesn't make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
author: David Wilkerson

quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
author: Rumi

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
author: James Baldwin

quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: True love stories never have endings.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: The best proof of love is trust.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the warmth of the sun on both sides.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
author: Karl A. Menninger

quote: Love is not about possession. It’s all about appreciation.
author: Anonymous

quote: Where there is love, there is life.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love is the strongest force the world possesses.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: Love is something eternal; the aspect may change, but not the essence.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk through my garden forever.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Love is like a flower; it needs the right amount of attention and care to grow.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love is a language spoken by everyone but understood only by the heart.
author: Anonymous

quote: A life without love is like a year without summer.
author: Swedish Proverb

quote: Love is not about finding the right person, but creating the right relationship.
author: Anonymous

quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
author: T. Tolis

quote: Love is like the sun, it shines brightly even on the darkest days.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love is like a puzzle. When you're in love, all the pieces fit.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure.
author: John Lennon

quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, and penetrates walls.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
author: Voltaire

quote: Love is the greatest adventure.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love is not what the mind thinks, but what the heart feels.
author: Greg Evans

quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back, they’re yours; if they don’t, they never were.
author: Richard Bach

quote: The best love is unexpected. You don’t just pick someone and cross your fingers it’ll work out.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love is a journey, not a destination.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love never fails.
author: 1 Corinthians 13:8

quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: Love is an endless act of forgiveness.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
author: Andre Breton

quote: Love is a gift you can give every day.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love grows by giving. The love we give away is the only love we keep.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: True love is eternal, infinite, and always like itself.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: We love because it’s the only true adventure.
author: Nikki Giovanni

quote: Love is the key to the secret of life.
author: Anonymous

quote: The greatest thing you’ll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
author: Nat King Cole

quote: Where there is great love, there are always miracles.
author: Willa Cather

quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Age does not protect you from love, but love to some extent protects you from age.
author: Jeanne Moreau

quote: Love is the only gold.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return.
author: Madonna

quote: Love is the absence of judgment.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire.
author: Jeremy Taylor

quote: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.
author: Princess Diana

quote: Love is the poetry of the senses.
author: Honoré de Balzac

quote: The only thing we never get enough of is love; and the only thing we never give enough of is love.
author: Henry Miller

quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
author: Max Müller

quote: Love is the expansion of two natures in such fashion that each include the other, each is enriched by the other.
author: Felix Adler

quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
author: John Updike

quote: Love is an energy which exists of itself. It is its own value.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
author: Albert Ellis

quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: The water shines only by the sun. And it is you who are my sun.
author: Charles de Leusse

quote: To love is to burn, to be on fire.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
author: Eva Gabor

quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
author: Plato

quote: Love is what you've been through with somebody.
author: James Thurber

quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Everything, everything I understand, I understand only because I love.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone, it has to be made, like bread; remade all the time, made new.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: If you press me to say why I loved him, I can say no more than because he was he, and I was I.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: True love is quiet; except in the nascent moments.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Love is the beginning of the journey, its end, and the journey itself.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: That word is love.
author: Sophocles

quote: Love is a divine essence.
author: Emanuel Swedenborg

quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Love is the emblem of eternity; it confounds all notion of time.
author: Madame de Staël

quote: A heart worth loving is one you understand, even in silence.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: We are shaped and fashioned by what we love.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.
author: Honoré de Balzac

quote: Love is a sacred reserve of energy; it is like the blood of spiritual evolution.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Love is the silent saying and saying of a single name.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: In the flush of love's light, we dare be brave. And suddenly we see that love costs all we are, and will ever be.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Love is the ultimate outlaw. It just won't adhere to any rules.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: Love is a choice you make from moment to moment.
author: Barbara De Angelis
